name: leonardo-converter
description:
Generate color themes via leonardocolor.io


Usage

  • Generate a color theme(s) via https://leonardocolor.io/
  • Copy Theme tab URL(s)
  • Run the plugin
  • Paste & press "Run"


Keep in mind

  • A short link to your theme will be attached to each color in the description.
  • If you want to change the colors in the created themes â€“ you don't need to reconnect the colors where they are used, just update the theme URL in the plugin.
  • All generated themes will be visible in the plugin even after it is restarted
